text: Perenesti Svyashchennyy mesyats (Ramadan) na srok drugoy - Poistine, uvelicheniye neveriya, i tol'ko; Im vvodyat v zabluzhdeniye nevernykh. Oni schitayut (etot mesyats) Dozvolennym v odnom godu, V drugom zhe - delayut yego zapretnym, Chtob privesti yego v soglasiye s tem srokom, Kotoryy povelel Allakh schitat' zapretnym, I etim sdelat' razreshennym (etot mesyats). Ikh zlodeyan'ya (vzor) ikh obol'shchayut. No pravednym putem Allakh nevernykh ne napravit
